component.name: DevedeNG
component.summary: A program to create video DVDs and CDs (VCD, sVCD or CVD)

description.p:
DevedeNG is a program to create video DVDs and CDs (VCD, sVCD or CVD), suitable for home players, from any number of video files, in any of the formats supported by FFMpeg.
The suffix NG is because it is a rewrite from scratch of the old Devede, to work with Python3 and Gtk3, and with a new internal architecture that allows to expand it and easily add new features.
